resources.string:
Grades in this term is an app to add your current term grades , it has four screens(activities) . First Activity (Main Activity) displays the list of all added data for the grades of the course of the term , in Second Activity (add new course activity) we add our grades with fields (course number, type of grade, grade received , total grades), in third activity which is about us activity shows the details of App working, in fourth activity(the bonus activity ) there is a list which shows the grades submitted and grades to date data which updates every entry in data base.
 
 Name:
Krishna Satani
